Package ie.gmit.sw

Class Database

java.lang.Object
ie.gmit.sw.Database
public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
Database Class which is used for Constructing Language Databases for the Subject Database File. Also Contains the Method to get the Language of the Query File by using Distance Measure Comparison
Version:
1.0
Author:
James Porter G00327095

    void add​(java.lang.CharSequence s, Language lang)
    Adds a Char Sequence converted into HashCode into the Language Database And Organizes them by Frequency. Get Handle of Language Map Create Map if it isnt there or Return it if it is

    Takes in the Map You Generated from the Query File Inputed in Menu And Discovers It's Language for You
    java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​LanguageEntry> getTop​(int max, Language lang)
    Creates a Concurrent HashMap and Sorts the Collection In Descending Order based off Frequency Also Adds a Rank to Each

    Cuts down a map to the Size entered as Max

    • add

      public void add​(java.lang.CharSequence s, Language lang)
      Adds a Char Sequence converted into HashCode into the Language Database And Organizes them by Frequency. Get Handle of Language Map Create Map if it isnt there or Return it if it is
      Parameters:
      s - Character Sequence S
      lang - The Language in Question

    • resize

      public void resize​(int max)
      Cuts down a map to the Size entered as Max
      Parameters:
      max - Sets The Max Amount of NGrams You want in the Map

    • getTop

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​LanguageEntry> getTop​(int max, Language lang)
      Creates a Concurrent HashMap and Sorts the Collection In Descending Order based off Frequency Also Adds a Rank to Each
      Parameters:
      max - Amount of NGrams you want in a map
      lang - Language in Question
      Returns:
      the New Map Known as Temp

    • getLanguage

      public Language getLanguage​(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​LanguageEntry> query)
      Takes in the Map You Generated from the Query File Inputed in Menu And Discovers It's Language for You
      Parameters:
      query - Query Map of NGrams relating to their Ranks and Frequencies
      Returns:
      Returns the Language the Program Believes It is based off the Distance Measurement

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Returns the Subject Database's Language, The NGrams,The NGram Frequencies and Rank of the NGrams
